title: What's News: Business & Finance; What's News: Business & Finance
text:
Credit Suisse warned it would lose around $1.6 billion in the fourth quarter after customers pulled their investments and deposits over concerns about the bank's financial health.

Workers at the world's biggest iPhone assembly plant clashed with police after protests erupted at the factory in central China, where the sprawling facility has been under strict Covid-19 controls for weeks.

What's News: Business & Finance
